properties.title: Luxury Beachfront Villa in Manuel Antonio
properties.description: Stunning 4-bedroom beachfront villa with panoramic ocean views, private pool, and direct beach access. Perfect for luxury vacation rental or permanent residence.

properties.title: Modern Condo in Escazú with City Views
properties.description: 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom modern condominium in exclusive Escazú development. Features include granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and spectacular city views.

properties.title: Coffee Farm Estate in Monteverde
properties.description: 50-hectare working coffee farm with colonial-style main house, processing facilities, and breathtaking cloud forest views. Established profitable operation.

properties.title: Beachfront Land in Tamarindo
properties.description: 2,500 m² of prime beachfront land perfect for luxury development. Direct beach access, stunning sunset views, and all utilities available.

properties.title: Mountain Retreat in San Gerardo de Dota
properties.location: San Gerardo de Dota, San José
properties.description: Eco-friendly mountain retreat with 3 bedrooms, organic gardens, and panoramic valley views. Perfect for nature lovers and bird watchers.

properties.title: Downtown San José Commercial Building
properties.description: 6-story commercial building in prime downtown location. Currently generating $8,000/month rental income. Great investment opportunity.

properties.title: Ocean View Home in Dominical
properties.description: Beautiful 2-bedroom home with stunning ocean views, tropical gardens, and minutes from world-class surfing beaches.

properties.title: Luxury Penthouse in Santa Ana
properties.description: Ultra-modern penthouse with 360-degree views, private elevator, rooftop terrace, and premium finishes throughout.

properties.title: Jungle Lodge in Puerto Viejo
properties.description: Unique jungle lodge with 8 guest rooms, restaurant, and adventure tour business. Established eco-tourism operation.

properties.title: Residential Development Land in Cartago
properties.description: 15,000 m² of prime residential development land with mountain views, approved permits, and infrastructure ready.
